title: SSM-Based Programming Instructional Design Workshop: Mobile Microlearning for Adult Educators

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Programming Concepts and Teaching Experience
context.additional_context: A program to enhance programming teaching competencies for pre-service and in-service teachers. Focuses on overcoming socio-technical learning barriers in smartphone-only technical constraint environments.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze problem situations in programming instructional design using the SSM (Soft Systems Methodology) 7-stage model
Learners can design three or more microlearning activity models suitable for mobile environments
Learners can develop assessment rubrics reflecting adult learners' social and technical difficulties

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
